price: 除他〔安拉〕外，他们只祈祷女神，只祈祷无善的恶魔。
arabic: إِن يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ إِنَٰثٗا وَإِن يَدۡعُونَ إِلَّا شَيۡطَٰنٗا مَّرِيدٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: in yadʿūna min dūnihi illā ināthan wa-in yadʿūna illā shayṭānan marīdan
